  1. Playing around with an IndieWeb avatar service, feed it a URL and it returns the avatar/icon for that site. I rely on Twitter avatars way too much, trying to move away from that. e.g. v1.indieweb-avatar.11ty.dev/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.a11yproject.com%2F/ Code: github.com/11ty/api-indieweb-avatar Live demo: 11ty.dev/speedlify/
    On twitter.com ♻️ 3 Retweets ❤️ 23 Favorites 2021 Sep 20 Mood 0
